login.we_emailed_a_magic_link_to.translation: We emailed a magic link to

login.click_the_link_to_signup.translation: Click the link to log in or sign up.

login.go_back_to_original_tab.translation: Go back to your original tab.

login.currently_working_on_getting_back_.translation: We're currently working on getting everything back to normal. Please try again soon.

login.request_new_link_generic.translation: Go back to your original tab and request a new magic link.

login.request_new_link_app.translation: Go back to your original **{appName}** tab and request a new magic link.

login.come_back_to_this_tab.translation: Come back to this tab after you click your magic link.

login.send_another_magic_link_to_email.translation:
Send another magic link to 
**{userEmail}**.
 the link to log in or sign up.

login.please_wait_x_seconds.translation: Please wait **{seconds}s** before sending another email.

login.please_send_another_link.translation:
Please send another magic link to 
**{userEmail}**.

login.hold_tight_fixing_issue.translation: Hold tight! We’re fixing an issue

login.unusual_activity_detected.translation: Unusual activity was detected. To help keep your account secure let us know if you recognize the login attempt below:

login.thanks_for_helping_us_keep_your_ac.translation: Thanks for helping us keep your account secure! We've blocked, and will block future login attempts from the source below:

login.let_us_know_if_you_recognize.translation: To help keep your account secure let us know if you recognize the login attempt below:

login.thanks_for_helping_us_keep_your_ac.translation: Thanks for helping us keep your account secure! We've blocked the login attempt from the source below:

login.magic_link_broken.translation: Link is broken — please request a new Magic link or open the link from another email client

login.cannot_access_private_app.translation: {userEmail} does not have any permission to access this app

login.think_theres_a_mistake.translation: Think there’s a mistake? Try a different login or contact {appName} for help.

login.email_blocked_message.translation: Sorry, you don’t have permission to log in to {appName}.

login.login_using_the_magic_link_sent_to.translation: Log in using the magic link sent to

login.enter_the_security_code_displayed_.translation: Enter the security code displayed by {appName}

login.redirect_login_complete_content.translation: You can now close this tab

login.invalid_redirect_url.translation: The given redirect URL is not in the allowlist.

login.magic_link_sent_from_different_ip_.translation: The magic link was requested from a different IP

login.magic_link_sent_from_different_ip.translation: Please click the link from the same device. If you did not request this link please ignore this message.

login.mau_limit_exceeded_description.translation: Please contact **{appName}** for help accessing your account.

login.request_new_login_code.translation: Please request a new login code

login.to_receive_a_new_code_please_retur.translation: To receive a new code, please return to {appName} and restart the login process.
